subject: Simplify code using code-simplifier
description:
Run the `code-simplifier:code-simplifier` plugin agent on the fibonacci implementation to simplify and refine code for clarity, consistency, and maintainability.

Focus on recently modified files:
- `src/utils/fibonacci.ts`
- `tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts`

After simplification, run tests: `bun run test -- tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts`
Commit if changes made: `refactor: simplify fibonacci implementation`

acceptance_criteria: Code simplifier run on fibonacci files
learnings: Code was already minimal â€” no simplification needed. Each function is under 10 lines of logic.
